H0.text: 10 mL was the volume of the gas after it was transferred from a 20 mL metal cylinder to a 40 mL enclosed container, both at room temperature.

H1.text: 20 mL is the volume of the gas after it was transferred from the 20 mL metal cylinder to the empty 40 mL container at room temperature.

H2.text: 30 mL is the volume of the gas after it was transferred from the 20 mL metal cylinder to the 40 mL container, both at room temperature.

H3.text: 40 mL is the volume of the gas after it is transferred from the 20 mL metal cylinder to the empty 40 mL container at room temperature.

A4.text: If the number of gas molecules and the temperature remain constant, then the pressure is inversely proportional to the volume.
